import React from 'react' import { Title, Desc, DocsFormContainer, DocsInputWrapper, DocsInput, DocTitle, DocWrapper, DocsDesc, DocLable, Wrapper } from './styles' import {FaAddressCard} from 'react-icons/fa' const Dossier = () => { let input = document.getElementById("inputTag"); let message = document.getElementById("message") input.addEventListener("change", ()=>{ let files = document.querySelector("input[type=file]").files[0]; console.log(files) }) return ( <> Documents necessaires Veuillez Fournir les documents Necessaire pour completer votre demande !
